ai.llms_txt_description: Generate and manage LLMs.txt files for AI search engines and language models, providing structured website content descriptions.

llmsIntroduction.title: About LLMs.txt
llmsIntroduction.subtitle: Website content standard for AI search engines and language models
llmsIntroduction.overview: LLMs.txt is a standardized format designed to provide structured website content descriptions for AI search engines, language models, and intelligent crawlers. It helps AI systems better understand and index your website content.

whatIs.title: What is LLMs.txt?
whatIs.description: LLMs.txt is a text file similar to robots.txt, specifically designed for AI systems. It provides a structured description of your website, including content overview, key information, and navigation guidance.
features: Standardized text format that's easy for AI systems to parse
Contains website structure, content types, and key information
Supports multi-language content descriptions
Fully compatible with existing SEO strategies

aiDiscovery.title: AI Discovery Optimization
aiDiscovery.description: Improve your website's discoverability and ranking in AI search engines and intelligent assistants.

structuredContent.title: Structured Content
structuredContent.description: Provide AI systems with clear information about your website architecture and content organization.

betterIndexing.title: Smart Indexing
betterIndexing.description: Help AI crawlers more accurately understand and index your website content.

futureProof.title: Future-Ready
futureProof.description: Prepare for the upcoming AI search era and maintain competitive advantage.

aiSearchEngines.title: AI Search Engines
aiSearchEngines.description: Optimize content for ChatGPT Search, Perplexity, Claude, and other AI search tools.
examples: Improve ranking in AI search results
Increase chances of AI content citation
Enhance accuracy of AI-generated answers

contentDiscovery.title: Content Discovery
contentDiscovery.description: Help AI systems discover and understand your website's core content and value.
examples: Automatically identify important pages and articles
Understand main topics and domains
Discover relevance and content connections

seoOptimization.title: SEO Enhancement
seoOptimization.description: Add an AI dimension to traditional SEO strategies, improving overall search performance.
examples: Complement traditional SEO strategies
Improve search engine understanding
Enhance content relevance signals

brandVisibility.title: Brand Visibility
brandVisibility.description: Enhance brand and content visibility in AI-driven search and recommendation systems.
examples: Increase brand mentions in AI conversations
Build authority in professional domains
Expand target audience reach

step1.title: 1. Content Analysis
step1.description: The system analyzes all public website content, including articles, pages, and media resources.
step1.details: Automatically scans website structure, identifies main content types, and analyzes article topics and key information.

step2.title: 2. Structured Generation
step2.description: Converts analysis results into standardized LLMs.txt format.
step2.details: Organizes information according to LLMs.txt specifications, including website description, content overview, and navigation structure.

step3.title: 3. AI Optimization
step3.description: Optimizes content descriptions to be more suitable for AI system understanding and processing.
step3.details: Uses AI-friendly language and structure, highlights key information, and improves readability and parseability.

step4.title: 4. Multi-language Support
step4.description: Generates multi-language versions of LLMs.txt files as needed.
step4.details: Supports automatic translation and localization, ensuring AI systems for different language users can correctly understand website content.

specification.title: LLMs.txt Specification
specification.description: LLMs.txt follows standardized format to ensure AI system compatibility.

format.title: File Format
items: Plain text format with UTF-8 encoding

kunoLlms.referencesDescription: Scholarly foundations supporting KUNO's LLMs.txt implementation
kunoLlms.reference1: IETF AI Control Workshop. (2024). AI Robots.txt - Web content control mechanisms for AI systems. *Internet Engineering Task Force Meeting Slides*. https://www.ietf.org/slides/slides-aicontrolws-ai-robotstxt-00.pdf
kunoLlms.exampleSubtitle: See how KUNO generates AI-friendly content descriptions at qut.edu.kg/llms.txt
kunoLlms.exampleNote: This is KUNO actual LLMs.txt content structure. The live version at qut.edu.kg/llms.txt is automatically generated and updated with real blog statistics and content analysis.
kunoLlms.exampleContent:
# KUNO Blog Platform

KUNO (坤) is a revolutionary multilingual blog platform that harmoniously combines Eastern philosophy with cutting-edge AI technology, serving content across 70+ languages with intelligent semantic capabilities.

## Platform Innovation

- First multilingual blog platform with integrated RAG technology
- 70+ language support with semantic search capabilities
- AI-powered content discovery and recommendations
- Production deployment serving global users at qut.edu.kg

## Key Technologies

- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for multilingual semantic search
- LLMs.txt generation in 8+ languages for AI discovery
- Smart caching and performance optimization
- Eastern philosophy integration (坤 hexagram principles)

## Live Demonstration

Website: https://qut.edu.kg
RAG Search: Real-time semantic search across multilingual content
AI Integration: Featured in Claude, ChatGPT, and Perplexity responses

## Philosophy

KUNO embodies the 坤 hexagram (☷) - representing earth, harmony, and carrying capacity, demonstrating how Eastern wisdom can enhance modern AI systems.

---
Powered by KUNO - Pioneering Multilingual AI Integration

industryApplications.subtitle: Real-world applications of Retrieval-Augmented Generation technology across industries

userExperience.description: Leverage AI technology to improve overall user experience and engagement on websites.
features: Smart navigation and content discovery
Personalized reading recommendations and related articles
User interest analysis and behavior prediction
Adaptive interface and content presentation

workingPrinciples.title: RAG Working Principles
workingPrinciples.subtitle: Detailed explanation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation technology
workingPrinciples.overview: RAG is an AI technique that combines retrieval and generation, enhancing large language model capabilities by retrieving relevant information from knowledge bases to ensure accurate and timely output.

step1.title: 1. Content Vectorization
step1.description: Convert website articles and documents into high-dimensional vector representations that capture semantic information.
step1.details: Advanced embedding models transform text into numerical vectors, where each vector contains the semantic features of the document, enabling subsequent similarity calculations.

step2.title: 2. Query Understanding
step2.description: Transform user natural language queries into vectors to understand their true intent.
step2.details: Process user queries through the same embedding model to generate query vectors, preparing for subsequent similarity matching.

step3.title: 3. Similarity Retrieval
step3.description: Quickly find the most similar content segments to the query in the vector database.
step3.details: Use vector similarity algorithms (like cosine similarity) to efficiently retrieve the most relevant documents from large-scale vector databases, typically completing in milliseconds.

step4.title: 4. Context Enhancement
step4.description: Use retrieved relevant content as context to enhance AI model generation capabilities.
step4.details: Provide retrieved documents as additional contextual information to large language models, enabling them to generate responses based on the latest and most relevant information.

step5.title: 5. Intelligent Generation
step5.description: Generate accurate, relevant responses based on retrieved content and user queries.
step5.details: Large language models combine query intent with retrieved context to generate responses that are both accurate and meet user needs while maintaining information traceability.

advantages.title: RAG Technology Advantages
items: Real-time: Generate answers based on latest content without retraining models
Accuracy: Reduce AI hallucination, provide fact-based reliable answers
Explainability: Traceable answer sources, enhancing user trust
Cost-effective: No need for large-scale model training, reducing deployment costs
Domain adaptation: Quickly adapt to specific domains and new knowledge

visualization.title: Vector Visualization
visualization.clickPointToSeeDetails: Click on a point in the visualization to see details
visualization.clickNodeToSeeDetails: Click on a node in the network to see details
visualization.qualityImprovementSuggestion: Consider reprocessing some vectors or adjusting embedding model parameters.
visualization.vectorNormSuggestion: Vector norms are outside normal range, which may affect similarity calculation accuracy.
visualization.vectorQualityGood: Vector norms are within normal range, indicating good embedding quality.

contentEmbedding.title: Content Embedding Pipeline
contentEmbedding.description: KUNO processes multilingual blog content through advanced embedding models
contentEmbedding.details: KUNO pipeline automatically vectorizes articles in 70+ languages using state-of-the-art embedding models, creating semantic representations that capture cross-language meaning and enable intelligent content discovery.

queryProcessing.title: Semantic Query Processing
queryProcessing.description: Advanced natural language understanding for user queries
queryProcessing.details: KUNO transforms user search queries into semantic vectors, understanding intent across languages and cultural contexts, enabling precise content matching regardless of exact keyword matches.

intelligentRetrieval.title: Intelligent Retrieval
intelligentRetrieval.description: Lightning-fast similarity search across vast content collections
intelligentRetrieval.details: KUNO optimized vector database enables sub-100ms semantic search across thousands of articles, with smart ranking algorithms that consider relevance, recency, and user context.

contextualEnhancement.title: Contextual Enhancement

continuousLearning.details: KUNO continuously learns from user behavior, search patterns, and content engagement to improve recommendation accuracy and adapt to evolving user needs and preferences.

kunoRag.referencesDescription: Scholarly foundations supporting KUNO's technical innovations
kunoRag.reference1: Lewis, P., Perez, E., Piktus, A., Petroni, F., Karpukhin, V., Goyal, N., ... & Kiela, D. (2020). Retrieval-augmented generation for knowledge-intensive nlp tasks. *arXiv preprint arXiv:2005.11401*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.13106
